xml:lang="en">271d398c-29de-4ff9-ba68-1b8e0621c6ee</documentcontainer:id>     <documentcontainer:fileIdentifier xml:lang="en">271d398c-29de-4ff9-ba68-1b8e0621c6ee</documentcontainer:fileIdentifier>     <dcterms:creator>clamw</dcterms:creator>     <dcterms:isPartOf rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata"/>     <dcterms:description xml:lang="en">This dataset consists of stock (length) data for linear features across Great Britain in 1984. The data are national estimates generated by analysing the sample data from 384 1km squares surveyed for the Countryside Survey long term monitoring project, then scaling up to a national level. The data are presented as mean lengths for 7 different feature categories within 45 different land class types, based on the ITE Land Classification. The Countryside Survey is a unique study or 'audit' of the natural resources of the UK's countryside, carried out by the Centre for Ecology and Hydrology. The sample sites are chosen from a stratified random sample, based on a 15 by 15 km grid of GB. Surveys have been carried out in 1978, 1984, 1990, 1998 and 2007 with repeated visits to the majority of squares. The countryside is sampled and surveyed using rigorous scientific methods, allowing us to compare new results with those from previous surveys. In this way we can detect the gradual and subtle changes that occur in the UK's countryside over time. In addition to linear features, habitat areas, species plot, soil plot, freshwater habitat and satellite map data are also produced by Countryside Survey.</dcterms:description>     <dcterms:issued rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2014-12-04T14:09:44Z</dcterms:issued>     <dcterms:title xml:lang="en">Countryside Survey 1984 estimates of linear feature lengths in Great Britain</dcterms:title>     <dcterms:subject>Monitoring & Observing Systems</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>Countryside Survey</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>grass strips</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>Habitats and biotopes</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>walls</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>NERC_DDC</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>hedges</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>banks</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>fences</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>tree lines</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>Great Britain</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:modified rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2014-12-15T09:58:37Z</dcterms:modified>     <dcterms:created rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2014-09-15T09:32:26Z</dcterms:created>   </documentcontainer:documentContainer> </rdf:RDF>
